testcaseName: Zoster: Zoster Dose administered at 60 years of age
generalDescription: This test case describes when a patient is administered a dose of ZVL (Zostavax) at age 60 years, that the first dose of the RZV (Shingrix) vaccine should be forecasted.
reasonForChange:
V3.4: Test case updated to accommodate new ACIP Zoster recommendations.
V2.0: New test case for version 2.0 which expanded scope into Adult recommendations
